headline20: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 9 airports right now.
management45: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 9 airports right now. Across base airports: 1 critical, 21 high, 17 medium. Base airports needing attention include London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR), Chişinău (RMO/LUKK), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) and Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and 17 others. Other base airports are mostly medium severity and should be monitored (17 flagged). At base airports, the main issues are low cloud base at Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), London Luton (LTN/EGGW) and Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and 17 others, mist at Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Iaşi (IAS/LRIA), Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) and 14 others, and very low visibility at Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), London Luton (LTN/EGGW), Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) and Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) and 9 others. Across the network, the worst‑affected airports include Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS), Valencia (VLC/LEVC), Sevilla (SVQ/LEZL), Turku (TKU/EFTU) and 3 others. Primary drivers are cold‑temperature performance penalties, snow / blowing snow and low cloud base. Expected impact: reduced runway capacity and higher delay/diversion risk at the worst‑affected airports, especially where visibility/RVR and cloud base are very low. Since the last update, 12 airports changed status, led by Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS), Valencia (VLC/LEVC), Sevilla (SVQ/LEZL), Turku (TKU/EFTU) and 6 others.
detail90: Critical operational constraints are flagged at 9 airports right now. Base airports (focus): London Luton (LTN/EGGW) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 400 m, cloud base around 100 ft | Copernicus Wrocław (WRO/EPWR) — HIGH: mist; cold-temperature performance penalties; visibility down to 2.4 km, cloud base around 300 ft | Chişinău (RMO/LUKK) — HIGH: mist; runway contamination risk; cold-temperature performance penalties | Iaşi (IAS/LRIA) — HIGH: mist; cloud base around 200 ft; below alternate minima (current METAR) | Katowice Wojciech Korfanty (KTW/EPKT) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 500 m, cloud base around 100 ft; forecast below approach minima at times | Bucharest Henri Coandă (OTP/LROP) — HIGH: fog; visibility down to 300 m, cloud base around 100 ft and 16 others. Worst affected now: Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; crosswind limitation risk (drivers: crosswind limitations, cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; strong gusts risk (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS) — CRIT: snow; cold-temperature performance penalties; crosswind limitation risk (drivers: crosswind limitations, cold-temperature performance penalties, snow/blowing snow) | Valencia (VLC/LEVC) — CRIT: strong gusts risk; cloud base around 0 ft (drivers: operational constraints) | Sevilla (SVQ/LEZL) — CRIT: strong gusts risk; cloud base around 0 ft (drivers: operational constraints) | Turku (TKU/EFTU) — CRIT: mist; snow; cold-temperature performance penalties (drivers: cold-temperature performance penalties, low ceilings, mist) and 3 others. Changed since last run: Copenhagen Kastrup (CPH/EKCH), Sandefjord Airport, Torp (TRF/ENTO), Malmö Sturup (MMX/ESMS), Valencia (VLC/LEVC), Sevilla (SVQ/LEZL), Turku (TKU/EFTU), Billund (BLL/EKBI), Adolfo Suárez Madrid–Barajas (MAD/LEMD), Suceava Stefan cel Mare (SCV/LRSV), Frankfurt-Hahn (HHN/EDFH) and 2 others.
